name: DUMPSTERFIRE
description:
A passion project that has taken shape over the past year.

You play as Booger (I couldn't come up with a better name) and are tasked with climbing out of the depths of the Earth to your ultimate goal of acquiring the Cheese.  But be careful, any misstep can send you tumbling down deeper into the caves.

You will wander through Hobo camps, dank caves pooling with sewage, icy glacial expanses, and eventually exit the Earth to finally uncover the rapidly-deteriorating Green Temple, home to the mysterious Cheese.

This game draws heavy inspiration from other "Foddian" games like Getting Over It and Jump King.  This means that there is no way to technically "lose" but it is all too easy to fall down and lose your hard-won progress.

Remember that god-awful bucket from near the end of Getting Over It? Half of this game is built around that stupid bucket cause why not.

Features and stuff

  • FREE
  • Beautiful MS Paint graphics
  • Terrible gameplay
  • Booger?
  • Booger.
  • The price? It's free
  • 0% completion rate (Get it because I just released it so nobody has been able to finish it yet)
  • 15 whole levels
  • Autosave system (Don't worry it will save all progress and failure)
  • Robust physics-based environments to traverse
  • If you're a streamer I might have snuck in a few easter eggs for you
  • Did I mention that it's free?

Update 1.01:

  • Added support for arrow keys

Update 1.015:

  • Fixed audio bug in menu
